headline: Hyliion Appoints New Vice President of Operations to Drive Manufacturing of the KARNO Power Module
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 17, 2025--Hyliion Holdings Corp. (NYSE American: HYLN), a developer of sustainable electricity-producing technology, is excited to announce Darrell Preble has joined Hyliion as the Vice President of Operations. In this role, Preble will be responsible for scaling Hyliion’s manufacturing infrastructure to bring the KARNO™ Power Modules to market in an efficient and cost-effective way.

headline: Will Cummins (CMI) Hybrid Mining Venture Redefine Its Clean Energy Margin Expansion Path?
summary: Cummins Inc. and Komatsu Ltd., with drive system partner Wabtec, recently signed a memorandum of understanding to jointly develop hybrid powertrains for heavy mining equipment, advancing decarbonization and operational efficiency in the sector. This collaboration adds a significant step toward Cummins' and Komatsu's ambitious sustainability targets, potentially offering mining customers productivity and cost advantages as they transition to cleaner solutions. We'll look at how Cummins' move...
